# SOCKS Proxy

SOCKS4, SOCKS4A, SOCKS5 proxy server and client

# Features

- [x] SOCKS4
- [x] SOCKS4A
- [x] SOCKS5
- [x] SOCKS5 with TLS

# References

https://www.openssh.com/txt/socks4.protocol

https://www.openssh.com/txt/socks4a.protocol

https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc1928

https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc1929
